meaning: Cultivated land area for the record.
evidence_basis: Explicit from column name and UCI variable listing.

meaning: Administrative/operational farming block identifier.
evidence_basis: Explicit from dataset values and column name.

unit_or_levels: rice variety labels (CO_43, ponmani, delux ponni)
meaning: Paddy seed variety used for cultivation.
evidence_basis: Explicit from column name and category values.

meaning: Dominant soil type in the field.
evidence_basis: Explicit from column name and category values.

meaning: Seed quantity applied for planting.
evidence_basis: Explicit from column name unit.

meaning: Land-preparation input quantity for the main field (abbreviation LP likely Land Preparation).
evidence_basis: Unit is explicit; LP expansion inferred from agronomy naming and source context.

meaning: Nursery method used before transplanting.
evidence_basis: Explicit from values and column name.

meaning: Area allocated to nursery bed (1 cent = 1/100 acre).
evidence_basis: Explicit from column name.

meaning: Land-preparation input quantity for nursery area (LP likely Land Preparation).
evidence_basis: Unit is explicit; LP expansion inferred.

unit_or_levels: application amount (unit not stated in metadata)
meaning: DAP fertilizer dose around day 20 of crop schedule.
evidence_basis: Timing explicit in name; exact application unit not documented in visible metadata.

meaning: Thiobencarb herbicide/weeding input around day 28.
evidence_basis: Chemical name and timing explicit; unit not documented in visible metadata.

meaning: Urea dose around day 40.
evidence_basis: Timing and fertilizer type explicit; unit not documented in visible metadata.

meaning: Potash fertilizer dose around day 50 (spelled Potassh in source data).
evidence_basis: Timing and fertilizer type explicit; unit not documented in visible metadata.

meaning: Micronutrient dose around day 70.
evidence_basis: Timing explicit; unit not documented in visible metadata.

meaning: Pesticide amount applied around day 60.
evidence_basis: Explicit from column name unit and timing.

meaning: Rainfall total/amount in first 30-day window.
evidence_basis: Rain and mm explicit; exact aggregation definition inferred from naming.

meaning: Irrigation amount for first 30-day window (AI/DAI code appears to refer to irrigation in source notes).
evidence_basis: mm explicit; AI/DAI expansion inferred from UCI/source-paper wording.

meaning: Rainfall amount in day 30-50 window.
evidence_basis: Rain and window explicit from naming.

meaning: Irrigation amount in day 30-50 window (AI/DAI label ambiguous but treated as irrigation).
evidence_basis: mm and window explicit; AI/DAI expansion inferred.

meaning: Rainfall amount in day 51-70 window.
evidence_basis: Rain and window explicit from naming.

meaning: Irrigation amount in day 51-70 window.
evidence_basis: mm and window explicit; AI expansion inferred.

meaning: Rainfall amount in day 71-105 window.
evidence_basis: Rain and window explicit from naming.

meaning: Irrigation amount in day 71-105 window.
evidence_basis: mm and window explicit; AI/DAI expansion inferred.

meaning: Minimum temperature over day 1-30 window.
evidence_basis: Min temp and window explicit; temperature unit not explicitly shown in column.

meaning: Maximum temperature over day 1-30 window.
evidence_basis: Max temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Minimum temperature over day 31-60 window.
evidence_basis: Min temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Maximum temperature over day 31-60 window.
evidence_basis: Max temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Minimum temperature over day 61-90 window.
evidence_basis: Min temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Maximum temperature over day 61-90 window.
evidence_basis: Max temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Minimum temperature over day 91-120 window.
evidence_basis: Min temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Maximum temperature over day 91-120 window.
evidence_basis: Max temp and window explicit; unit inferred.

meaning: Instantaneous wind speed statistic for day 1-30 window.

evidence_basis: Explicit from column name unit and window.

evidence_basis: Explicit from column name unit and window.

meaning: Instantaneous wind speed statistic for day 91-120 window.

meaning: Post-cultivation byproduct quantity (trash bundles), observed after yield realization.
evidence_basis: Strong target correlation pattern plus domain interpretation that trash is measured post-cultivation/harvest; treat as leakage.

meaning: Observed paddy yield outcome for the record.
evidence_basis: Explicit target field name in dataset.
